Another vignette in this package sent us a file. 

```{r,eval=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
db <- src_sqlite("maps_county.sqlite3", create = FALSE)
db
```

There are two tables in it, and luckily we know what to do. 

```{r,eval=FALSE}
tbl(db, "geom")

tbl(db, "metadata")
```
